name: Castform Snowy Form
description: This is Castform’s form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.effect: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon’s attack costs.

attacks.name: Frosty Typhoon
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Frosty Typhoon.
